Dana-Farber Marathon Challenge runners, friends, and family are invited to our annual pre-race celebration, the DFMC
Pasta Party! Offering a pasta buffet from 4:00 - 4:45 p.m., and a speaking program from 4:45 - 6:00 p.m.,
ticketholders will enjoy an inspiring start to race weekend. The event will feature guest speakers, celebrate our Patient and In-Memory
Program partners, recognize our top fundraisers, honor lifetime achievement and milestone year runners, and more.
